thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Eclipse Resources Announces Strategic And Financial Review Initiative

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Eclipse Resources Announces Strategic And Financial Review Initiative
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Eclipse Resources Corp:
* ECLIPSE RESOURCES ANNOUNCES STRATEGIC AND FINANCIAL REVIEW INITIATIVE
* ECLIPSE RESOURCES CORP - ‍HAS NOT SET A TIMETABLE FOR COMPLETION OF REVIEW PROCESS​
* ECLIPSE RESOURCES - RETAINED JEFFERIES AS FINANCIAL ADVISOR AND NORTON ROSE FULBRIGHT US AS LEGAL COUNSEL TO ASSIST WITH PROCESS​
* ECLIPSE RESOURCES - STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES REVIEW PROCESS HAS NOT BEEN INITIATED AS A RESULT OF RECEIVING ANY TRANSACTION PROPOSAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
